summary: When a fracking environmental accident rips apart the earth's crust, the resulting hole lets out prehistoric sharks from underground. The sharks target a group of women and trap them in a cabin.
cast: Dominique Swain|Traci Lords|Christine Nguyen|Cindy Lucas|Amy Holt|John Callahan|Corey Landis|Chris De Christopher|Tabitha Marie|Serafin Falcon|Oscar DeRosa|Skye McDonald|John Archer Lundgren|Steven Louis Goldenberg|Robert Hummel
keywords: shark|shark attack|fracking|shot in the arm|punched in the face
title: Sharkansas Women's Prison Massacre
